contentrichtext.text: {{Unreferenced stub|auto=yes|date=December 2009}} {{Infobox Korean name|title=Um | hangul = 엄 | hanja = 嚴 | rr = Um | mr = Ŏm | text = Also transliterated as:<br /> Eom, Uhm, Aum, Oum, Ohm, Om or Uam }} '''Um''' ({{ko-hhrm|엄}}) is a [[Korean surname]]. == List of people with the Korean surname Um == * [[Um Aing-ran]] (born 1936), South Korean actress * [[Um Da-Woon]] (born 1985), South Korean football player * [[Um Hong-Gil]] (born 1960), South Korean climber * [[Um Ki-joon]] (born 1976), South Korean actor * [[Um Sang-hyun]] (born 1971), South Korean voice actor * [[Uhm Ji-won]] (born 1977), South Korean actress * [[Uhm Jung-hwa]] (born 1971), South Korean singer and actress * [[Uhm Tae-woong]] (born 1974), South Korean actor == See also == * [[List of Korean family names]] [[Category:Korean-language surnames]] {{Surname-stub}}
